page.title: 13LEISURE IN LOUNDSLEY GREEN
page.content:
The older children of the Lenthall family have more active passtimes than the younger ones.
Both{Helen}(13yrs) and{Christine} (14yrs) use the athletics facilities in Chesterfield. One of Helen's favourite{hobbies}is drama. She belongs to a Chesterfield drama group. Helen's friend{Rachel Hunt}enjoys hiking in the local area. This is particularly enjoyable in the nearby Peak District National Park. Christine is a member of a local{Girl Guides} troop.
{Peter Lenthall}is 12 years old and is a keen cricketer. He belongs to Oxcroft Barbarians C.C.
